title: Understanding Extrapyramidal Side Effects (EPS)
text: Extrapyramidal side effects are a group of symptoms that can occur in individuals taking certain medications, particularly antipsychotics. These symptoms are related to movement disorders.

title: Types of Extrapyramidal Side Effects
text: EPS can include symptoms such as akathisia (a feeling of restlessness), dystonia (muscle contractions), tardive dyskinesia (involuntary movements), pseudo-Parkinson’s (Parkinson-like symptoms), and neuroleptic malignant syndrome (a severe reaction).
